      • getStrArrayByPath

        public static java.lang.String[] getStrArrayByPath(JObject obj,
                                   java.lang.String path)
        This method returns an array of Strings representing the information stored at the specified path within the specified object. If the element specified by path is a string value it will be returned as an array of one element in size. If the element specified by path is an JArray of string values the data is converted to a string array and returned. In all other cases either null is returned or an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object data is to be retrieved from
        path - A path to a node within the specified object, f.e. "/some/element/at/some/leaf"
        Returns:
        Returns null if the property does not exist or has no string data.
